page.title: 11Christleton Church Festival.
page.content: {Christleton Church}is dedicated to St James and on his Saints day in July each year a festival is held in his memory.Children,their parents and Sunday School teachers gather around the Village Green carrying posies and bunches of flowers.At 3pm a procession led by the Choir,the Rose Queen and her retinue the Rector and children moves to the Church grounds where many villagers are gathered.At the end of the service the children take their flowers and place them on any untended grave in the graveyard.This ancient ceremony gives a great deal of pleasure to the old people of the Village and is a Thanksgiving to God for the work of the Church in the Village Community.Prayers and hymns are also sung on the ancient{Beating {of the Bounds Ceremony}which takes place every ten years.Distance 11miles
